title: Relates to developing and implementing programs to prevent workplace violence in public schools
summary: Relates to developing and implementing programs to prevent workplace violence in public schools.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1257

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                    January 6, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sens.  ADDABBO,  GOLDEN,  HUNTLEY,  OPPENHEIMER, PARKER,
         PERALTA -- read twice and ordered printed,  and  when  printed  to  be
         committed to the Committee on Labor

       AN  ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to developing and implement-
         ing programs to prevent workplace violence in public schools

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Paragraph a of subdivision 2 of section 27-b of the labor
    2  law, as added by chapter 82 of the laws of 2006, is amended to  read  as
    3  follows:
    4    a. "Employer" means: (1) the state; (2) a political subdivision of the
    5  state[,  provided,  however  that  this  subdivision  shall not mean any
    6  employer as defined in section twenty-eight hundred one-a of the  educa-
    7  tion  law]; and (3) a public authority, a public benefit corporation, or
    8  any other governmental agency or instrumentality thereof.
    9    S 2. The provisions of this act  shall  not  diminish  the  rights  of
   10  employees pursuant to any law, rule, regulation or collective bargaining
   11  agreement.
   12    S 3. This act shall take effect on the one hundred twentieth day after
   13  it shall have become a law; provided, however, that effective immediate-
   14  ly,  the  addition,  amendment, and/or repeal of any rule, regulation or
   15  guideline necessary for the implementation of this act on its  effective
   16  date  is  authorized  and directed to be made and completed on or before
   17  such date.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01375-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to developing and implementing programs to prevent workplace violence in public schools
